test.name: TC1: Upload valid csv file to portal should populate working class heros in system

kw.name: Create Chrome Driver And Open Url
Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into file input field ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollTo(0,6000) Without any arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact text ``expected``.

arguments.arg: £645357.35 will be dispensed to 28 Working Class Hero/s

kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath:/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/p[1]' contains exact text '£645357.35 will be dispensed to 28 Working Class Hero/s'.

kw.name: Clean Up Data And Close Browser
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=rakedbsession, url=http://localhost:8080/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/rakeDatabase path_url=/calculator/rakeDatabase headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/rakeDatabase status=200, reason= headers={'Content-Type': 'text/plain;charset=UTF-8', 'Content-Length': '21', 'Date': 'Thu, 06 Oct 2022 16:33:39 GMT'} body=Successfully raked DB

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.name: TC1:Dispense now button on screen should be red colored (GET)

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
